overview:
Benoit Vatere serves as Director of Customer Success for Magnify360 where he oversees the optimization team and the professional services team.

Prior to magnify360, Benoit created and managed the sales channel, as well as all channel marketing initiatives, for QPuncture, an alternative medical software publisher. Benoit has held several marketing management positions with medical and technology-related companies in France and earned his Bachelor in Business Administration from ENITA in Bordeaux, France.

relationships.title: Co-Founder and VP of Client Success

milestones.description: Join LookSmart as VP, Distribution Network
milestones.source_description: LookSmart Announces Appointment of Benoit Vatere to Vice President, Distribution Network
